divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside having a cigar when I saw what I first thought was a satellite coming from the west then it slowly turned in a southern direction. I called my wife and asked to to watch it and she also saw it change direction.
Summary: Bright light moved from west then turned to the south
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
There were no other sightings in Grants Pass on or around June 25th 2012
